sense.name: a plague, disease epidemic
sense.examples: The pest was spread by rodents coming off sailing ships. Villagers up and down this river are dying from an unknown pest.

sense.name: an annoying person
sense.examples: The pest behind me on the plane kicked my seat through the flight. Mary didn't want to become a pest by asking too many questions.

sense.name: destructive animal, often an insect
sense.examples: In recent years, deer have become real garden pests around here. This spray will kill many types of flying pests.
